Professional.title: Plasma Physics
Professional.comment: Anything related to the study of plasmas in the universe, but especially low energy plasmas

Professional.title: Web applications
Professional.comment: The use of web technologies to influence the flow of data that generates a user's experience, from conception to consumption

Professional.title: Embeded systems
Professional.comment: SoC devices provide solutions for remote sensing and actuation problems with scalibililty concerns

Professional.title: Modeling
Professional.comment: The prediction of the behavior of a system according to its physical properties when done correctly provides valuable insights for future implementations

Personal.title: Swimming
Personal.comment: An all-rounded sport, soothing to the mind

Personal.title: Team Sports
Personal.comment: Football, Voleyball, Water Polo. They emphasise communication and reinforce bonds

Personal.title: Scuba
Personal.comment: Exploring places where the human body by itself cannot go is always a thrill

Personal.title: Traveling
Personal.comment: New cultures, ways of thinking. Aiming to visit every country in the world

extra.Title: Modeling of Low Pressure Plasmas in CH4-H2 Mixtures

Web Front End.description: Design pattern providing offline-ready native app-like user experiences with web apps

Web Front End.name: React

Web Front End.description: Suite of frontend components for application building provided by Google

Web Back end.name: Flask
Web Back end.description: Python framework for generating simple server-side web applications (ex: REST API, DBMS connections)

Web Back end.name: Django
Web Back end.description: Python framework for generating enterprise-grade server-side web applications

Web Back end.name: AioHTTP
Web Back end.description: Python framework for generating single-threaded server-side web applications leveraging python's async module

Web Back end.name: Websockets
Web Back end.description: Full-stack construct that allows full duplex communication, making real-time web applications possible

Web Back end.name: NodeJS
Web Back end.description: Javascript runtime for server-side developmnent of web applications (ex: REST API, DBMS connections)

Web Back end.name: Celery
Web Back end.description: Task queue for distributed message/task management

Web Back end.name: ZeroMQ
Web Back end.description: Open source task queue for performant distributed message/task management

Web Back end.name: HTTPS
Web Back end.description: Secure HTTP communication between client and server

Data Storage.description: File based key-value store for simple applications

Data Storage.name: FaunaDB
Data Storage.description: Serverless NoSQL database for data storage in a serverless architecture
